nodes.text: Hyderson's proof was a mathematical proof which Avon Starros was familiar with. While stranded on the moon Wevo, Starros attempted to explain the proof to Honesty Weft after the two Jedi accompanying them, Vernestra Rwoh and Imri Cantaros, left to investigate the other people they had sensed on the moon. However, Weft, grieving the recent death of his father, retreated to the corner of their cave to sulk while Starros was in the middle of her explanation, leading her to conclude that he had no head for mathematics.
